__e: Didn't give me his name, but I'm telling you, he wasn't Sherlock Holmes.
When I was a child, someone used to smuggle Sherlock Holmes books. ... from the mainand. Now's my chance to pay amateur detective.
You know he was an idiot, I know he was an idiot, but to everyone else he was the greatest detective since Sherlock Holmes.
It's a pleasure. Sherlock never said that you two knew each other.
It's funny that Sherlock's never mentioned me to you. I wonder why that might be?
Sherlock didn't say much about you over the years, but he said enough.
